reviewText: At first, I found this video frustrating. She wasn't as hot as I was expecting. When I hear "26 year old Goddess" I don't think chubby wrists, jello thighs, elongated nose, and frizzy hair. It looks like she's been using "natural" shampoos. And then occasionally the camera would cut to some Lilly pads and some obnoxious quote would fade in. Look, lady, I know Buddha means a lot to you, but I didn't pay $1.99 to see inspirational quotes.But then something strange happened. Maybe it was the Zen-ness of the garden that started to seep into my psyche, but I all of the sudden found myself floating on a psychospiritual energy field, kind of like Jeffrey Lebowski, and I felt my petty concerns about the female "standard" of beauty start to evaporate into a sea of passion and serenity and peace. Sure, maybe her wrists are chubbier than I would like, but did you notice, when the sunlight was just so, the splendor of those tiny soft filaments of lower-back fuzz? There's some unconventional beauty there. I could get with a girl like that.
Title: Pure Nude Yoga - Zen Garden Goddess

reviewText: This is ok to watch..if you want to see a pretty naked female who is silent the entire film doing yoga poses.What it's not, is an instructional yoga video.  It announces the pose before the scene, but does not verbally instruct or say anything.  You will fall asleep if you actually try to watch the entire dvd(at least 1 hour), and the lighting is not done very well.  The sunlight is way too bright on many of the poses.It is shot in a Japanese-like garden setting with a little brook and some plants all around.Each pose lasts a long 5-7 minutes, and repeats camera angles going slowly up and down the yoga model.It is moderately exciting to see in certain poses, but it's not a graphic porn-you will only see at most some shaved labia. Besides, I doubt anyone could actually watch this in it's entirety more than once.If you are extremely curious about this, I suggest renting it.
summary: Depends on what you're looking for...
Title: Pure Nude Yoga - Zen Garden Goddess

reviewText: You'll probably laugh, but I got this DVD in an effort to persuade my husband to try Yoga with me.  His job has him overly stressed, and in addition to preparing him healthy food, and making sure our life is full of fun and adventure, I also wanted him to try meditation or yoga. Meditation flatly rejected, as was Yoga. I thought this video might help get him on the mat. sadly, it didn't (laughs). I tried. I failed. Stubborn man. As a yoga video, this is OK. It's not awful. It's just laughably pitiful that I stooped to this to get my husband to give this a try. As a woman, I don't need a nude woman to do yoga (chuckles).
summary: You'll laugh when you read why I bought this video

reviewText: The model in this video is very attractive and sexy, but the camera work is very bad. She is in shadow most of the time so all you see is a silhouette. When she is in full sun and it's over exposed and glare. There was probably about 12 minutes of quality exposure  in 45 second increments scattered through out the video. It's too bad too because the girl is truly beautiful.The video scene is set in an arboretum and the camera does a better job capturing the plants than the lovely naked woman.I have seen videos where the model obviously doesn't know anything about yoga. This girl seems to have some previoius experience. You would have a difficult time practicing yoga along with her since there is no verbal cueing. I suppose one might practice their own personal routine using this video for background. I can't imagine any other use for this video.The video has two audio settings, one with some pleasant oriental music and one with nature sounds only.It's a shame that such a lovely woman bares all and the camera person can't operate a camera. When the shot is done correctly it is great, high quality and enchanting. The trouble is that a good shot is so rare, 80% of it is not worth watching.
Title: Pure Nude Yoga - Zen Garden Goddess

reviewText: My wife is a woman who does yoga about six days a week and we viewed this video together.  She noted that she does a different more active yoga, less meditative.  Zen Garden Goddess moves fluidly and that she is unburdened by clothing allows the viewer to follow her moves and admire the poise and strength embodied in her movement.  We look forward to other videos from ZGG.

reviewText: I'm the only person I know who has a yoga-related injury - a knee weakened by having to sit on my heels for an hour every morning and evening for the few months I was enrolled at a yoga-schram.  Eventually I had to have arthroscopic surgery to trim my torn meniscus, and this experience turned me off yoga.My interest in these videos is therefore entirely aesthetic and erotic, and it's a toss-up as to which of the two young yoginis is more lovely.  The blonde in the first video is very young - possibly still in her late teens - and she smiles joyously.  The brunette is a bit older - mid-twenties I'd guess.  Her smile seems forced and she does not appear to have emptied her mind as completely as the blonde. Neither woman seems uncomfortable at being mother-naked, and both have taken pains to look their best, with painted nails, shaved armpits and carefully trimmed (or waxed?) body hair, umbilical piercings, and tasteful abstract tattoos.The main difference between the two videos is in the explicitness of the camera-work.  The first video, with the blonde, is so discrete that students of yoga could find themselves handicapped, and for the voyeurs among us this hiatus is frustrating.  The second video abandoned this caution, leading to a franker exposure of the brunette, whom we get in full-frontal camera angles, with no attempt to hide or avoid what the French call "la chatte." Such directness helps us see her as a whole human being.  This seems to me a healthy attitude, and one in keeping with the philosophy of yoga, which sees sex as nothing to be ashamed of.There is a Hindu holy book, the KAMA SUTRA, that is a how-to guide to yogic lovemaking.  It would be fascinating to watch a video of a couple practicing yogic sex.  One particularly fascinating practice - which I would love to see - is the male yogi's reputed ability to reclaim his seed by reversing the process by which it was expelled.  I wonder if this seeming physiological impossibility can actually happen.  Does anyone know whether a video of a yogi and yogini making love is available, and if so, where?
Title: Pure Nude Yoga - Zen Garden Goddess

reviewText: Not to everyone's taste, assuredly, but if you have the background to appreciate this specialized film, it is most excellent.  Personally, I use it as an adjunct to sitting meditation, allowing it to fade in and out.  The sights and sounds are very conducive.  Each image is thoughtfully framed and left on screen a satisfyingly long time.  I love the soft-focus, still shots of the bamboo, the iris, and other garden features that background the Yoga.  The thought-provoking quotations from Buddhist tradition are also a nice touch.Yogini Wenona is in exemplary shape, toned and flexible.  Her poised, confident execution of each pose is a "teachable moment."  That she is nude allows the viewer to clearly see and appreciate every bodily nuance of her practice.  (Porn fans and prudes, there is nothing for you here.  Move along, move along.)The play of light and shadows in these images says they were mostly shot at "magic time" in the early morning or late afternoon when garden greens are most intense.  I must express sympathy for Wenona in what appears to have been an all-day shoot.  Toward the end,  her shoulders, arms and chest were looking distinctly sunburned.Of the three programs in the Pure Nude Yoga series so far, this is my favorite, but I hope the producers will continue to create new episodes.  Other possible settings come to mind: redwoods, mountains, the interior of a monastery or Zen center, almost anywhere a person can find a quiet, scenic setting for an hour of asana.  This is first rate film-making, and I want to see more of it.The unobtrusive soundtrack of wind chimes and/or natural sounds is a perfect accompaniment to the visuals.If I am allowed a minor quibble, I do find the director's frequent use of the "Beam me down, Scotty," lap/fade camera trick to make our Yogini "magically" appear on her empty mat before each new sequence to be an unnecessary distraction.
Title: Pure Nude Yoga - Zen Garden Goddess

reviewText: I bought this mainly because I'm into staring at naked girls and sort of was interested in trying yoga. The part about staring at naked girls is great: no problems there! There are lots of close ups of her nude bod, and lots of slow panning all over her while she's posing. The camera is not shy about panning to the areas of her body in which you would buy this dvd for. The slow panning adds to the excitement of watching. There's not a lot of up close shots of her butt area. Mostly breasts and some vag. Lots of breast tho. She's really normal and everyday looking, not porn star'ish. Nothing is too gratuitous. Well made dvd. Natural lighting, so sometimes there is shade, but you can still see what you want to see.This dvd will not show you how to do yoga, and it's going to be pretty difficult if you're buying it for that reason. I thought I would try it because a.)I love naked girls b.)what better way to actually WANT to watch a yoga dvd when the chicks naked? Well, if you already have some base knowledge of the yoga positions, this would be a good dvd for you to follow along with and motivate you while also rewarding you with nude girl. There is no talking or instruction, just mellow wood chime type music and the occasional Zen quote.Worth purchasing if you already know a little about yoga and you appreciate hot naked girl doing yoga and are looking for an excuse to follow along with the dvd.Worth purchasing if you just want to watch a pretty (nude!)lady doing yoga in a sunny, tranquil setting.NOT worth purchasing if you wanted to learn yoga.
Title: Pure Nude Yoga - Zen Garden Goddess
